from supabase import create_client

SUPABASE_URL = ''https://kshrhufpoltrbgzuagyb.supabase.co''
SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY = ''eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6ImtzaHJodWZwb2x0cmJnenVhZ3liIiwicm9sZSI6InNlcnZpY2Vfcm9sZSIsImlhdCI6MTc2NTcwODA2MCwiZXhwIjoyMDgxMjg0MDYwfQ.XmiaE1VClRsh6xsV39iqCfk3PaikmpN3oSm0FXc8aXo''

supabase = create_client(SUPABASE_URL, SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY)

# Find user by email
users = supabase.auth.admin.list_users()
user = next((u for u in users if u.email == ''shaitamam@gmail.com''), None)

if user:
    print(f''Found user: {user.id}'')
    # Update tier to admin
    result = supabase.table(''profiles'').update({''tier'': ''admin''}).eq(''id'', user.id).execute()
    print(f''Updated profile to admin: {result.data}'')
else:
    print(''User not found'')
")

Add complete Find My Journal SaaS application

Features:

- Hybrid search algorithm with discipline detection
- Specialized journal filtering by topic relevance
- E2E tests with Playwright

Backend:
- OpenAlex API integration for journal discovery
- Works-based and source-based hybrid search strategy
- Discipline-specific filtering to improve relevance
- Supabase integration for auth and search logging

Frontend:

- Protected search page with form validation
